statements: UPDATE scientific_publications SET title='New Title', author='John Doe' WHERE publication_id='7b1ad3d7-6267-4d0e-8e99-0f90bcca4dd9';
UPDATE scientific_publications SET publish_date='2022-10-15', abstract='Updated abstract content' WHERE author='Jane Smith';
UPDATE scientific_publications SET author='John Doe', title='New Title' WHERE publication_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE scientific_publications SET publish_date='2022-01-15', abstract='Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.' WHERE publication_id='98765432-1010-8999-7777-543210987654';
UPDATE publications SET title = 'New Title', abstract = 'Updated Abstract' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE publications SET authors = ARRAY['Author1', 'Author2'], publication_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE publications SET title = 'Updated Title', authors = ARRAY['Author A', 'Author B'] WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE publications SET abstract = 'This is an updated abstract.', publication_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE publications SET title = 'New Title', publication_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE keywords SET keyword = 'New Keyword' WHERE keyword_id = 2;
UPDATE publications SET title='New Title', publication_date='2023-09-15' WHERE publication_id=1;
UPDATE publication_keywords SET keyword_id=3 WHERE publication_id=2;
UPDATE Publications SET title = 'New Title', author = 'New Author' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Publications SET publication_date = '2022-10-20', abstract = 'New abstract text' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Publications SET author='John Doe', title='Updated Title', publication_date='2022-01-01' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Authors SET affiliation='University XYZ' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE publications SET publication_title = 'Updated Title', publication_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE publication_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE authors SET author_affiliation = 'New Affiliation', author_name = 'John Doe' WHERE author_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE publications SET publication_title = 'New Title', publication_author = 'New Author' WHERE publication_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE journals SET journal_editor = 'New Editor', journal_publisher = 'New Publisher' WHERE journal_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
